text: To find first N prime numbers in python
I am new to the programming world.
I was just writing this code in python to generate N prime numbers.
User should input the value for N which is the total number of prime numbers to print out.
I have written this code but it doesn't throw the desired output.
Instead it prints the prime numbers till the Nth number.
: User enters the value of N = 7.

code:
i=1
x = int(input("Enter the number:"))
for k in range (1, (x+1), 1):
    c=0
    for j in range (1, (i+1), 1):
        a = i%j
        if (a==0):
            c = c+1

    if (c==2):
          print (i)
    else:
          k = k-1

    i=i+1
